item.title: Why is this project free?
item.description:
MAT 21:12 [CLEANSING OF THE TEMPLE] And Jesus went into the temple of God, and cast out all them that sold and bought in the temple, and overthrew the tables of the moneychangers, and the seats of them that sold doves
13 And said unto them, It is written, My house shall be called the house of prayer; but ye have made it a den of thieves.

MAT 10:7 And as ye go, preach, saying, The kingdom of heaven is at hand.
8 Heal the sick, cleanse the lepers, raise the dead, cast out devils: freely ye have received, freely give.
9 Provide neither gold, nor silver, nor brass in your purses
10 Nor scrip for [your] journey, neither two coats, neither shoes, nor yet staves: for the workman is worthy of his meat.

Whats my food and my work ?.

I do work with a worldly job as faith demands.

1CO 4:12 And labour, working with our own hands: being reviled, we bless; being persecuted, we suffer it:
EPH 4:28 Let him that stole steal no more: but rather let him labour, working with [his] hands the thing which is good, that he may have to give to him that needeth.

In faith, what i eat is this.

JHN 4:32 But he said unto them, I have meat to eat that ye know not of.
33 Therefore said the disciples one to another, Hath any man brought him [ought] to eat?
34 Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work.
35 Say not ye, There are yet four months, and [then] cometh harvest? behold, I say unto you, Lift up your eyes, and look on the fields; for they are white already to harvest.

My work is this:

JHN 4:34 Jesus saith unto them, My meat is to do the will of him that sent me, and to finish his work

How then could i in faith demand money of people for the word they seek. I would rather see that everyone came together into building a tool that was free, and where we all gathered our riches in the heavens rather than in this world; where everything fades away.

What then about adverticement?

Good question. Will i allow carnal parties to promote their projects here in a blitzing manner?. Will they not disturb our study.
Do we not hear babbling of this sort everywhere, why then would we want it here.

Am I to ask for money?, What then would i profit in the heavens.

Why would I take from the worker, steal like the worldy governments of this world.

How then were I in a serving spirit if I forced other to serve me?

Why would I ask that you pay out your belongings, you could in your right mind choose to use your own efforts toward God yourself.
We all know there is poor everywhere, and that there is billions of people chosing to put time in asking for money for such a effort.

I must add, i'm sick and tired of hearing about money babble when i seek the truth.

I will not allow this place to turn into a "den of thieves." As Jesus put it; in his spirit, may we prevail.

By uid[1]

item.title: Mindmaps
item.description:
Users may now create and share their own mindmaps.

There is also included a multi-categorical system; having autosuggest for creating new categories.

Where to find

You can find the feature in dialer→mindmap.

This works for all devices having javascript and flash capabilities.
 

Creating your own

For android i also recommend trying out a app called mindjet. It can also be used to create and view mindmaps.
For windows,linux and mac there exist many tools. The one im currently using is called freeplane with all its addons.

Linking to bible

If you wish to link a verse to the bible, or link to other maps. This is possible.
A example with freeplane is: right-mouseclick→Link→Add or modify hyperlink (type)→/?s=isa+2:22
Link to another mindmap: /Mindmap/?f=1%2F7+SPIRITS+OF+GOD.mm

You can link to whatever you'd like.

In the future

I hope to make mindmaps from topical bibles/maps; and also create abilities of searching and perhaps manipulating mindmaps.

By uid[1]

item.description:

I will start to map even developer functions, and having ideas in there as well.

http://BibleWay.us/Mindmap

item.title: Ancient Hebrew Strongs
item.description:
Dig into the root language of ancient hebrew.
Now you can find ancient hebrew strongs and fonts.

To view the ancient hebrew fonts; download and install the fontfile given in http://dl.dropbox.com/u/5638259/shared/Proto-Semitic.zip
Or install this file: http://scripture.sf.net/inc/style/Proto-Semitic.ttf
After installing browse for example: http://scripture.sf.net/?b=63,65&bk=GEN&c=7


By uid[1]

item.title: Scripture 2.1
item.description:
Download it here https://sourceforge.net/projects/scripture/files/latest/download

Now with paraphrased search, topical bibles, dictionaries, colored userfeatures, "Bible hitter"(new concept).

Auto-suggest/complete form. New way of mapping the bible, simplified topical list generators.

Among other things:

+Hide bibles
+Tri vers database
+-Topical Bibles
  +-simple create form in user-features for user private(or shared) library
+-Database security http://php.net/manual/en/function.mysql-query.php check suggested alternatives(minimal completetion)
+Colored bookmarks..(selecting all)
+-color bible link for forum topics..
+colored comments and topics in bible content
+php edit/list files in main&inc for admin
+headline coloring in bibles
+-search through biblemaps
+table column for themes generated
+bibles grouped together by language for selecting all
+fixed forum menu(now appearing throughout the forum).
+-, to include multiple verses(Currently works with a single selected chapter).
+fixed "search highlight color" missing
+fixed *search all bibles* (also limited to selected bibles)

And much more.

By uid[1]

item.title: On the verge of breakthrough
item.description:
Creating topical bible maps is now being made even simpler.

Login and click on the verse of your choice→Topic

It will be automatically linked to that verse of your choice.

In the future this will be extended with more functionalities.

As always; suggestions and ideas is welcomed.

By uid[1]

By uid[1]

item.title: How long will this site be online?
item.description:
The website is hosted on sourceforge.com ; which is a organization who aims at supporting opensource projects like this. They make money through ads and donation.
They do respect "old projects"; so even the dead ones stand. And by this I expect this site to stand for as long as there exist computers, opensource developers and also internet connection to USA.
But beside this i'll continue in the future to make backup and restore features so no information can be lost.

This site have 3 domains for now, bibleway.us is a payable domain, and it might go down when i do. But the free domains scripture.sf.net and bibel.sf.net will continue.
This project "scripture" is a opensource; which means that it's code is available to the other. And as developments turn, I will release future releases.

I don't prioritize this as long as noone shows any interest in joining the development; so i continue alone as always.

Then if it was a time this site died; someone else would have the source and be able to host it.

By uid[1]

item.title: Breakthrough development
item.description:
I'm experimenting with some new ways of searching, and I believe I can with some assistance make some highly advanced ways to search the bible.

This new way of searching will be a "most preferable feature".
One might even be asking "why didn't someone make this before".

I seek assistance by someone who knows a little javascripting.

Look at http://scripture.sourceforge.net/?shoot
 

By uid[1]

item.title: Creating Bible Maps Part 1
item.description:
Goto Dialer
→Topic
→(Click on any map)
→Choose New Map
→Choose a "title" and click Go

Go back to Topic dialer and choose your map

Click on New Entry
→Choose a "Menu item" subject. For example "GEN" Short for genesis.
→Choose a title. For example "Both man and woman possess the seed of life"
→Choose a context, For example ";GEN 3:15"
→If you for example wish to enter a date of "scientific discovery"; enter the year: 1700
→Now choose the type "Context and verses are links". For the context ";Gen 3:15" to be linked.
→Hit Go to save.

Then your done.

This is one of many possible ways of generating maps.
You may experiment using the Testmap if you want.

By uid[1]

item.title: How to search between verses
item.description:
Goto the Searher menu and generate a simplified search.

On the bottom of results-page hit the link for searching between verses.

By uid[1]

item.title: Visitors count hit the roof
item.description:
These last two weeks we have around 300 unique visitors every day.

About 2000 new and unique visitors in two week time.

Kriss

By uid[1]

item.title: Paraphrases
item.description:
Automatic paraphrase and semantic alternative rewriter.

New autocompleter function have also been implemented, use "," to implement for multiple words. for example: Love, Beloved
Words of the complete kjv have also been added. And other language bibles can be added by requirement (contact the developer).

A paraphrase editor have been added, and for now there is 3 levels.

Strategy for the pharaphrases haven't been completely formed, but there is 3 alternatives for level 1, 3 for level 2 and 4 for level 3.
One plan is to have level 1 as obvious equality to words. For example God, Lord
Level 2 to be "almost". And level 3 More distinctive.

In the future sharable functions will be implemented, and further group operations.

Plans also exist of turning this search engine into a working bible a.i.
This plan would require more data and usages. Tell people about it.

A more possible future function is equal to google suggest "did you mean".
But for now it will be automated.

I request of you assistance; generate paraphrase lists of choice.
The possibilities of having a fully grown/understanding bible search engine exists.
We can in one possibility add former languages to be rewritten for searches so that the engine could become more understanding to the earlier generations.
Different dialects, languages, and personalized lists.

When people start to use it, i will also implement export and import functions.
If you have made a list of words outside the site that may be paraphrased, please contact me.

Here you may find the editor: http://scripture.sf.net/?para

Appart from these improvements, new logic operator have been added in order to form a complete logical search language.
The recent change have been the implementation of "or" operator. Which is "|"; example: God|Lord

I pray that you cooperate in order to generate the very best working solution of biblical search engine.

Thank you

Kriss

By uid[1]

item.title: Er jesus gud?
item.description:
Er jesus gud ?, kan vi tilbe menneske skikkelse som gud ?

ROM 1:20 For helt siden verdens skapelse har Hans usynlige egenskaper* vært klart synlige; det gjelder Hans evige kraft og Hans guddommelighet; disse kan kjennes ut fra de gjerninger som er gjort. Slik er de uten unnskyldning. <*eller: Guds vesen.> 
21 For selv om de kjente Gud, æret de Ham ikke som Gud, eller takket, men de ble tomme* i sine tanker, og deres dåraktige hjerte ble formørket. <*ødelagt.> 
22 Mens de gjorde krav på å være vise, ble de bare dåraktige,* <*tåpelige.> 
23 og de byttet bort den uforgjengelige Guds herlighet med et bilde gjort lik et forgjengelig menneske, og bilder av fugler, firbeinte dyr og krypdyr. 
24 Derfor overgav Gud dem også i deres hjerters lyster til urenhet, slik at de vanærer sine legemer seg imellom. 
25 De byttet ut Guds sannhet med løgnen og tilbad og tjente skapningen i stedet for Skaperen, Han som er velsignet i all evighet. Amen. 

Legg merke til "et forgjengelig menneske".

Hva menes egentlig med dette?.
La oss forsøke å drøfte dette med bibelske standpunkter.

1JN 5:1 Hver den som tror at Jesus er Kristus, er født av Gud. Og hver den som elsker Faderen, elsker også den som er født av Ham. 
2 På dette kjenner vi at vi elsker Guds barn, når vi elsker Gud og holder Hans bud. 
3 For dette er Guds kjærlighet, at vi holder Hans bud. Og Hans bud er ikke tunge å bære. 
4 For alt det som er født av Gud, seirer over verden. Og dette er den seier som har seiret over verden, vår* tro. <*F-tekst: deres.> 
5 Hvem er den som seirer over verden, om ikke den som tror at Jesus er Guds Sønn? 
6 [Guds vitnesbyrd om Sin Sønn] Han er den som kom ved vann og blod - Jesus Kristus. Ikke bare med* vann, men med* vann og blod. Og Ånden er den som vitner, for Ånden er sannheten. <*eller: i.> 
7 For det er tre som vitner i himmelen: Faderen, Ordet og Den Hellige Ånd. Og disse tre er Én. 

Jeg kunne godt tatt med hele kapittelet.
det sanne vitnet på jorden er nettopp herren(som er en autoritet) jesus er med dem som har han i autoritet/følger hans fotspor. da vandres veien i hans fotspor. om det da er i sannhet, så vil det jo bli sett. men sannheten kommer først og fremst av gud. og jesus/om vi vandrer hans veier, vil da være oss; en avglans av hans vesen ettersom han skal være våres læremester. og da når vi gjør ettersom det, da vil gud ta bolig i oss. (se joh 14:23-24).

"7 For det er tre som vitner i himmelen: Faderen, Ordet og Den Hellige Ånd. Og disse tre er Én. " i joh 5-, dette trenger ikke si at dem er et vesen direkte, men at deres vitne skal være samstemt. akkurat som "når lyden spilles av mesteren av instrumentet, så vil det klinge slik som mesteren mente det".

jesus ærer gud, og vi skal gjøre det samme. gud er hva som alltid er over alle ting, og han kan ikke bli begrenset; selv med en mennesklig skikkelse. tid og rom kan ikke inneholde han på noen måter?.

Hvordan kan paulus da si "hans fylde er fullendt i han".

COL 4:12 Epafras, som er en av dere, en Kristi tjener, hilser dere. Han strider alltid med iver for dere i bønn, for at dere kan stå fullkomne og fullendte* i all Guds vilje. <*UN: fullt visse.> 
Det skal vi alle stå en gang; og jesus skal være som våres hode.

skal vi da bli lik gud? definitivt ikke.; for som han er et evig funksjon over alle domener, så ville vi allerede vert der om det var så om det skulle. men vi er skapt til å være et avbilde av han. men hvor langt strekker et avbilde. er et bilde noen gang mer enn bare et bilde?

EPH 3:19 og å kjenne Kristi kjærlighet, som overgår all kunnskap, for at dere kan bli fylt til* hele Guds fylde. <*med.> 

Hvordan er da jesus den sanne mediatoren ?

Er han da et annet vesen som står imellom?, for da gjør vi allerede gud todelt. trenger gud en mediator? eller viser det heller til at når noen gjør lik "jesus" med å gjøre det rettferdige da, vil bli hørt av den måten. for gud hører jo allerede alle ting før dem ble utøvd.

By uid[1]

item.title: Mechanical Translation
item.description:
We now got mechanical translation of the torah; http://scripture.sf.net/?b=28&bk=GEN&cs=1 -

This might make it possible for me now to continue doing the same for the rest of the old testament.

Appart from this I will be working on completeing a complete hebrew bible with dictionary(strongs).

http://scripture.sf.net/?&b=60&bk=GEN&cs=1 -

If some of you know hebrew. Please qualitycheck these.

Thank you.

item.title: Something to share? Then contribute
item.description:
This project/site sends a request to you who is out there.

Join this community.
Share your tallents as it might be given with the Lord.

This project is free; and welcome contributers. We don't require money; but rather we would do better with you. If you are gifted by God.
This site will grow, new features will come. You don't need to be a developer in order to contribute.

This could be your project too!
Get content. Share it. Write it. Communicate.

By uid[1]
